name: seek
description: (Music bot) Skip around in the currently playing audio.

options.name: time
options.description: Seek to a specific timestamp in this track.

options.name: timestamp
options.description: Timestamp to skip playback to in this track. Example, /seek time 2:10

options.name: time
options.description: Time to skip forwards in the current track. If no time is provided, 30 seconds will be used.

options.name: time
options.description: Time to skip backwards in the current track. If no time is provided, 30 seconds will be used.
